CONTACT

Show me what you need

Describe what you expect from your website. Thanks to this, I will be able to determine the cost and time of its implementation. If you are not sure about any of the answers - that's okay. You may not understand some of points and this is fully understandable. Before you decide whether you want to use my services, I will advise you on the best solutions and answer your questions for free. Sending the form does not oblige you to anything.

In the 'other form of contact' field, you can enter a more convenient form of contact than email. For example: Messenger (Name + Surname), WhatsApp (nickname), Skype (nickname). Please let me know what communication method you choose and enter your nickname. Maintaining e-mail contact makes it longer for me to get to know your needs. If you are from Poland, providing a phone number will be the best idea.

4. Describe in a few sentences what website you need. What do you want on it? What function is it supposed to perform? Do you have any idea what it should look like? Let me know what you need and ask questions if you want me to advise something*:

5. If you would like your website to be made in a similar style to an existing website - here you can enter the addresses of these websites and a description of what elements you like. If you do not know such pages - leave the field blank:

5

1. Determine the number of pages on the website - if you do not know the number, please provide an approximate one.

2. Responsive Web Design (RWD) - over 50% of all internet traffic comes from mobile devices. Currently, this type of design is necessary, so every website I create uses RWD.

3. On-Page Search Engine Optimization - I will make changes to the website structure to help achieve good results in Google (highly recommended).

4. Help with domain and hosting - you can purchase and transfer yourself or outsource this work to me (recommended).

5. CMS - WordPress - if you want to add your content while the website is running, it will be a good choice.

6. Online Shop - WooCommerce - If you want to sell on the Internet. **Currently, the service is only available in Poland**
